title: Literary landmarks of Edinburgh,
author: Hutton, Laurence
snippet: western suburbs of Edinburgh, running from Dean Terrace over the Water of Leith to Raeburn Place. Here he completed " The Queen's Wake."

title: Haco the Dreamer: a tale of Scotch University life
author: Sime, William
snippet: Haco had never been in Edinburgh by himself. He had often been with a little croAvd of Dreghom boys to play cricket in the park at Holyrood, or to kick a football in Raeburn Place. On these occasions he had not distinguished himself much; his long hair being too much of a joke for both sides to permit him to feel as if he were one of them.
